t: Hval, Jenny - Apocalypse Girl - Amazon.com Music
s: Jenny Hval's new album, Apocalypse, girl, is out June 2015 via Sacred Bones. It's the follow-up to her 2013 LP Innocence is Kinky and 2014's Meshes of Voice, her collaborative LP with Susanna. The LP features production from Norwegian noise fixture Lasse Marhaug.

t: Amazon.com: Iris Silver Mist: CDs & Vinyl
s: Iris Silver Mist is the new album by Norwegian musician, writer and artist Jenny Hval. Named after the fragrance by Serge Lutens with the same name, the album too moves like a perfume—between flower and smoke, ghostly yet alive. The album didn’t start with music, but with its absence.

t: 'Jenny Hval
HVAL,JENNY - Viscera - Amazon.com Music
s: Jenny Hval is a Norwegian artist and writer. With her background in writing and performance her music is poetic, sensual, challenging, dark and beautiful as well as melodic and spacious. Viscera is set in the body. The songs are stories of flesh and travelling, both sensual and provocative.

t: Classic Objects - Blue LP from Jenny Hval
s: Classic Objects - Blue LP from Jenny Hval, $21.23 USD. “In 2020, like everyone else, I was just a private person,” says Hval. “No artists were allowed to perform. I was reduced to ‘just me.’” As a result, Hval questioned what “just me” could mean.
